mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (author, wdate, title, contents) VALUES (#{author}, now(), #{title}, #{contents})
INSERT INTO board (author, wdate, title, contents, pnum) VALUES (#{author}, now(), #{title}, #{contents}, #{pnum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE (title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sen},'%')) OR (author LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sen},'%')) ORDER BY num DESC

WITH RECURSIVE tmp1 AS (
SELECT num,title,author,wdate,contents,views,pnum,likes ,num AS grpno ,CONCAT(REPEAT('0',(6-CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(num AS CHAR(30))))),CAST(num AS CHAR(30))) path ,0 AS lvl FROM board WHERE pnum is null
UNION
SELECT b.num, b.title,b.author,b.wdate,b.contents,b.views,b.pnum,b.likes ,t.grpno ,CONCAT(t.path,',',CONCAT(REPEAT('0',(6-CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(b.num AS CHAR(30))))), CAST(b.num AS CHAR(30)))) AS path, t.lvl+1 AS lvl FROM tmp1 t JOIN board b ON t.num=b.pnum ) SELECT num, CONCAT(REPEAT('ㅤㄴRE:',lvl),title) title,author,DATE_FORMAT(wdate,'%Y-%m-%d') wdate
,contents,views,pnum,likes,path,lvl,grpno FROM tmp1 ORDER BY grpno desc, path asc
SELECT b.rn FROM ( SELECT * , @rownum:=@rownum + 1 AS rn FROM board , (SELECT @rownum:=0) r ORDER BY num desc) b WHERE b.num = #{num}
SELECT num,title,author,DATE_FORMAT(wdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, contents, views FROM board WHERE num=#{num}
SELECT num,title,author,DATE_FORMAT(wdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, contents, views FROM board WHERE num IN ( SELECT max(num) FROM board WHERE #{num}>num )
SELECT num,title,author,DATE_FORMAT(wdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, contents, views FROM board WHERE num IN ( SELECT min(num) FROM board WHERE num>#{num} )
SELECT num,title,author,DATE_FORMAT(wdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as wdate,contents, views FROM board
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET views = views+1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select: SELECT num from board WHERE num=#{num}
